page.title: 01BISHOPS CASTLE
page.content: Our area is mainly agricultural.It is a shallow valley bounded by hills rising to almost 1000 feet to the south and west.{Bishops Castle}is the main centre of population(approx 1700). It is a small market town set on a hill in the SW corner of the block. There was a{Norman castle}but all that remains is part of the wall which is in a public park (The Castle Site) next to the Bowling Green,which is claimed to be the second oldest in the country. The main street runs down from the castle to the church. The tower is the oldest part of the church.It was built in Norman times. The rest of the church was burnt but was rebuilt in 1860.
